meanings.definition: The action of repeating something aloud from memory.
meanings.sent1: During the recitation, she remembered all the words perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The students took turns in the recitation of their favorite poems.
meanings.sent3: The parrot's recitation of the alphabet was quite impressive.
meanings.sent4: Her recitation of the facts was like a well-rehearsed play.
meanings.sent5: The recitation of the pledge echoed through the school hallways.

meanings.definition: A formal reading or presentation of something aloud.
meanings.sent1: The recitation of the speech captivated the audience.
meanings.sent2: The recitation of the rules was necessary for everyone to hear.
meanings.sent3: The recitation of the menu made everyone hungry.
meanings.sent4: His recitation of the poem was like a beautiful melody.
meanings.sent5: The recitation of the story brought it to life for the listeners.

meanings.definition: The act of reciting or repeating something.
meanings.sent1: Her recitation of the multiplication table was flawless.
meanings.sent2: The recitation of the recipe helped everyone follow along.
meanings.sent3: The recitation of the joke made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: His recitation of the events was like a detailed timeline.
meanings.sent5: The recitation of the instructions clarified the process for everyone.
